xwikidoc.name: ImageDisplayer
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity output=false}} $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.Widgets', {'colorTheme' : "$xwiki.getSpacePreference('colorTheme')"})## $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.Widgets')## #set ($displayerName = 'PhenoTips.ImageDisplayer') #set ($displayer = $xwiki.getDocument($displayerName)) #set($options = { 'fieldName' : "", 'filter' : ['png', 'jpg', 'jpeg', 'gif'], 'manage' : false, 'inputType' : 'checkbox', 'isImage' : true }) #set($options.mode = "$!{xcontext.action}") #if ("$!{name}" != '' && "$!{prefix}" != '' && "$!{object}" != '') ## In displayer mode #set ($targetDoc = $doc) #set ($property = "$!{name}") #set ($propValue = $value) #set ($fieldName = "$!{prefix}$!{name}") #set ($options.mode = "$!type") #set ($xclass = $object.getxWikiClass()) #set ($qString = "doc=$!escapetool.url($!{targetDoc.fullName})&property=$!{property}&classname=$!escapetool.url($!{object.xWikiClass.name})&object=$!{object.number}") #elseif ("$!{request.doc}" != '' && "$!{request.classname}" != '' && "$!{request.object}" != '' && "$!{request.property}" != '') ## In external mode #set ($targetDoc = $xwiki.getDocument("$!{request.doc}")) #set ($property = "$!{request.property}") #set ($xclass = $xwiki.getClass("$!{request.classname}")) #set ($object = $targetDoc.getObject("$!{request.classname}", $mathtool.toInteger("$!{request.object}"))) #set ($propValue = $object.getProperty("$!{request.property}").value) #if ("$!{propValue.size()}" == '') #set ($propValue = []) #end #set ($fieldName = "$!{request.dprefix}$!{request.classname}_$!{request.object}_$!{request.property}") #if ("$!{request.mode}" != '') #set($options.mode = "$!{request.mode}") #else #set($options.mode = "$!{xcontext.action}") #end #if ("$!{request.manage}" != '') #set($options.manage = true) #end #set ($qString = "doc=$!escapetool.url($!{targetDoc.fullName})&property=$!{request.property}&classname=$!escapetool.url($!{xclass.name})&object=$!{request.object}") #end #if ($xclass.get($property).getProperty('multiSelect').value != 1) #set($options.inputType = 'radio') #if ("$!{value}" == '') #set ($propValue = []) #else #set ($propValue = [$value]) #end #end ## TODO: This is a workaround. Find a better way to specify accepted file formats. #set($options.html5Filter = "$!{xclass.get($property).getProperty('validationRegExp').value}") #set($formats = "$!{xclass.get($property).getProperty('validationMessage').value}") #if ($formats != '') #set ($options.filter = $formats.split('\s*[,| ]\s*')) #if (!$options.html5Filter.contains('image')) #set ($options.isImage = false) #end #end #if ($options.filter && $options.filter.size() > 0) #foreach($item in $options.filter) #set($options.rawfilter = "$!{options.rawfilter}, ${item}") #end #if ($options.rawfilter) #set($options.rawfilter = $options.rawfilter.substring(2)) #end #end #macro (__getExtension $filename)$!{filename.substring($mathtool.add($filename.lastIndexOf('.'), 1)).toLowerCase()}#end #macro (__displaySelectableAttachment $attachment $targetDocument $selection) {{html wiki=false clean=false}}##
## #if ($options.manage) ## #end #if($options.isImage)
#else## $services.localization.render('phenotips.imageDisplayer.open')#end##
## {{/html}}## #end #macro (__displaySelectableAttachmentList $targetDocument $selection) (% class="attachment-list" %)((( #set ($sortedAttachments = $sorttool.sort($targetDocument.getAttachmentList(), 'date:desc') ) #if ($sortedAttachments.size() == 0)(% class="hint" %)$services.localization.render('phenotips.imageDisplayer.noneAvailable')(%%)#end #foreach ($attachment in $sortedAttachments) #set ($extension = "#__getExtension($attachment.getFilename())") #if ($options.filter.size() == 0 || $options.filter.contains($extension)) #__displaySelectableAttachment($attachment $targetDocument $selection) #end #end {{html wiki=false clean=false}}{{/html}}## )))(% class="clear" %)((()))### #end #macro (__displayLastAttachmentSelected $targetDocument) #set ($sortedAttachments = $sorttool.sort($targetDocument.getAttachmentList(), 'date:desc') ) #if ($sortedAttachments.size() > 0) #set ($attachment = $sortedAttachments.get(0)) #set ($extension = "#__getExtension($attachment.getFilename())") #if ($options.filter.size() == 0 || $options.filter.contains($extension)) #__displaySelectableAttachment($attachment $targetDocument [${attachment.filename}]) #end #end #end #macro (__displayUploadForm $targetDocument) {{html wiki=false clean=false}}
#if (${options.rawfilter} != '') $services.localization.render('phenotips.imageDisplayer.acceptedFormats') ${options.rawfilter} #end
{{/html}} #end #macro (__displayGallery $targetDocument $selection) #set ($content = '') #foreach ($name in $selection) ## This filters file names that already contain another document reference ## Regexp means: contains @, not preceded by an odd (2n+1) number of escape characters ## Since lookbehinds must have a known maximum length, only check for at most 11 preceding tildas #if ($name.matches('.*(?$services.localization.render('phenotips.imageDisplayer.uploadAndManage'){{/html}} #end #__displaySelectableAttachmentList($targetDoc $propValue) ))) #else## not edit #__displayGallery($targetDoc $propValue) #end## context action check #end## target object & property exist and are valid #end## not a custom action {{/velocity}}
